subject: the horse
the hound
the horn
body: the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to

subject: the farmer
body: the farmer sowing his corn that kept

subject: the rooster
body: the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke

subject: the priest
body: the priest all shaven and shorn that married

subject: the man
body: the man all tattered and torn that kissed

subject: the maiden
body: the maiden all forlorn that milked

subject: the cow
body: the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed
